text: The Afrikaner Weerstandsbeweging (AWB) is a South African political party for the Afrikaner people, the Boers. It was formed in 1973 by Eug√®ne Terre'Blanche. He led the party until his death in 2010. It is now led by Steyn van Ronge. They are a party for the Afrikaans-speaking white South Africans who want their own nation. They want to name it Boerestaat. The party is not as extreme as other parties who want to kick out all the black South Africans. The AWB simply wants a state within SA borders. The AWB also wants to go back to apartheid, or at least some of them want it. They claim to seek to end the killing of White people by Black people. The organisation is not violent, but it used to be back in the 1990s. ==References== Category:Fascism Category:Rebel militia groups in Africa Category:1973 establishments in Africa Category:Political parties in South Africa Category:Nationalist organizations in South Africa Category:20th-century establishments in South Africa
